about_the_game:
Embark on a fast-paced action journey through space, discovering new weapons and abilities through acquisition and research to better each run. Invite friends to experience it with you!

Be careful how you order your items

Each time you are hit, and item will drop from your ship. When you have no items left, you are only one hit away from critical hull breach!

Beam into derelict ships to use unique abilities to combat unique enemies!

Take the ship back to base to research the new technology for later runs

Check out the mothership bar between missions, in first person view!

Fully interactable level between missions to talk to characters about research, combat and story events

Death in co-op does not leave you out of the fun!

When you die in multiplayer coop, you will be attached to a player who is still alive, but you will be missing your items.
When the player you are in picks them up, you can shoot from the alive player's ship!

Each time you are hit, and item will drop from your ship. When you have no items left, you are only one hit away from critical hull breach!

Death in co-op does not leave you out of the fun!

name: Critical Upload

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 9th Gen Intel / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / RX560
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 10th Gen Intel / Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / RX5700XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
